text: Nicolas Chumachenco (also known as Nicolas Chumachenko; March 27, 1944 – December 12, 2020), was a Polish-born Spanish-German violin soloist and professor. He was director of the Queen Sofía Chamber Orchestra. Chumachenco was born in Kraków, in Nazi-occupied Poland, to Ukrainian parents who left Poland at the end of the Second World War. Chumachenco died on December 12, 2020 in Schallstadt, Germany at the age of 76.Fallece el reconocido violinista Nicolas Chumachenco, con 76 años de edad ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish violinists Category:German violinists Category:Musicians from Kraków Category:Spanish musicians
title: Nicolas Chumachenco
